alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Maytown, or near Scottsmoor, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oak Hill, Geneva, Scottsmoor, Mims and Bethune Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole
